Class DialogueWindow

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Disableable, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout

    public class DialogueWindow
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.TextButton
    Displays dialog. Has an internal reference to another dialog window and to an Enum called Callbackcode. If one is not null, it's executed when the textbox is clicked.
    Author:
    Lduperron
